issue.title: Atlas v3 URDF has no collision models

content.raw:
Yes, I get the same segfault issue in rviz.

Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
ogre_tools::STLLoader::load (this=0x7fffffff9020, buffer=<optimized out>)
    at /tmp/buildd/ros-fuerte-visualization-common-1.8.4/debian/ros-fuerte-visualization-common/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/visualization_common/ogre_tools/src/ogre_tools/stl_loader.cpp:117
117     /tmp/buildd/ros-fuerte-visualization-common-1.8.4/debian/ros-fuerte-visualization-common/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/visualization_common/ogre_tools/src/ogre_tools/stl_loader.cpp: No such file or directory.

Yes, I get the same segfault issue in rviz.

Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault. ogre_tools::STLLoader::load (this=0x7fffffff9020, buffer=<optimized out>) at /tmp/buildd/ros-fuerte-visualization-common-1.8.4/debian/ros-fuerte-visualization-common/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/visualization_common/ogre_tools/src/ogre_tools/stl_loader.cpp:117 117 /tmp/buildd/ros-fuerte-visualization-common-1.8.4/debian/ros-fuerte-visualization-common/opt/ros/fuerte/stacks/visualization_common/ogre_tools/src/ogre_tools/stl_loader.cpp: No such file or directory.
